page.title: 01BRANDON PARK
page.content: There is very little to say about this block as it is all forest and comes under the Forestry Commission as part of the Thetford Forest and administry of Santon Downham. Ref. 0580 0285. There are 2 miles of the B1106 and 1m of the A1065 passing through. Express coaches to London use the A1065 but there are no stops. Local coaches are in a state of flux with their services especially since one large firm went bankrupt this summer.(1985). Part of anold track, the Shakers Road meets the B1106 at Mayday Farm which is now a F.C. depot. The small piece of heathland in the west at Wangford Warren is left clear to facilitate military aircraft to land at Lakenheath Airfield.
